statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={4.6}, \displaystyle{b}={5.4}, \displaystyle{c}={6.3}, and \displaystyle{d}={8.1} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={104}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
